files.description: Pytest end-to-end smoke test that runs the project entrypoint with a fixed seed into a temp output directory, asserts expected artifact files exist, validates required JSON schema keys, and optionally checks image outputs for stable size/hash bounds to catch regressions.

missionDescription: Add a pytest (tests/test_artifacts.py) that runs the entrypoint with a fixed seed and asserts created files exist plus validates JSON schema keys (and optionally image hash/size bounds) to detect regressions.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
